definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: It expects Q2 gross margins to be in the mid-to-low teens.
sentences.chinese: 該公司預計第二季度毛利率將維持在中下水平。

sentences.english: “We are looking at fairly decent gains in consumer spending in the second quarter, ” said Conrad DeQuadros, a senior economist at RDQ Economics in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望能在第二季度看到消費支出的合理增長。

sentences.english: If home the second quarter opened 51 new lease operating a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 如家第二季度新開設了51家租賃經營酒店。

sentences.english: The second-quarter earnings season starts next week.
sentences.chinese: 第二季度財報季將於下週開始。

sentences.english: Nokia saw a 41 percent growth rate over the prior year’s second quarter sales, which sounds positive, but when compared to Android’s 886 percent gain, Nokia’s growth pales in comparison.
sentences.chinese: 較去年第二季度，諾基亞獲得了41%的銷售增長率。

sentences.english: Home Depot says its earnings fell 7% across the fiscal second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 家得寶聲稱整個第二季度收入下跌了7%。

sentences.english: Just some exploitable trends that are emerging from the second-quarter earnings numbers.
sentences.chinese: 只講一點第二季度收益數字透露的可資利用的動態。

sentences.english: The Chinese territory of Hong Kong slipped out of recession in the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 中國的香港特區在第二季度擺脫經濟衰退。

sentences.english: Arledge expects the first rate increase to come during the second quarter of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 阿利奇預計首次加息將發生在2011年第二季度。

sentences.english: Construction is scheduled to begin in the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 預計新廠將於本年的第二季度破土動工。

sentences.english: S. dollars. Alcoa's results opened the second quarter results season, the big-screen release.
sentences.chinese: 美國鋁業的財報拉開了第二季度財報發佈季節的大幕。

sentences.english: It fell to 15% by the second quarter of this year.
sentences.chinese: 到今年第二季度，諾基亞份額已經下降至15%。

sentences.english: Longhu, for example, froze its open market land sales in the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 例如，龍湖，凍結了在第二季度公開市場土地的銷售。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
